Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Game extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents a game. When a new game is created it is in the State.CREATED state. While in this state, players can be added through the method addPlayer(...). When the desired number of players (@see numberOfPlayers in the constructor) is reached the game can be started with the method startGame(). At this point the game state is State.STARTED.
See Also:
